content: pattern minecraft hat is designed to create a warm wool based cozy and fun hat for little and not so minecraft s fans original yarn drops merino extra fine grey 04 50g/105m lana gatto super soft green 14508 50g/125m but any wool half wool yarn with appropriate yardage can be used yo will need around 80g of main color and 50g of additional color for chart including yarn for pompom needles circular 3 5mm and 4mm 40mm length two sizes are described in pattern 52-54cm and 54-56cm
